data.name: Invader TD
data.detailed_description:
Invader TD brings the classic tower defense experience to a side scrolling environment, manage your resources to strategically build your defenses and defend against enemy attacks while evolving to be able to conquer planet earth.

You are in control of an alien race that aims to dominate planet Earth, but the human beings will not let that happen, use your skills to defend yourself from human attacks, building structures and evolving them.



  • Exciting battles
  • Physics based
  • Stylized pixel art
  • 5 towers types
  • 10+ enemies types
  • Original soundtrack
data.about_the_game:
Invader TD brings the classic tower defense experience to a side scrolling environment, manage your resources to strategically build your defenses and defend against enemy attacks while evolving to be able to conquer planet earth.

You are in control of an alien race that aims to dominate planet Earth, but the human beings will not let that happen, use your skills to defend yourself from human attacks, building structures and evolving them.



  • Exciting battles
  • Physics based
  • Stylized pixel art
  • 5 towers types
  • 10+ enemies types
  • Original soundtrack
data.short_description: Invader TD is a side scroller tower defense, where the player is in the role of an alien race with the purpose of infecting and dominating the earth, but for that you must protect yourself from the attacks of the humans, who are trying to destroy you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
